synopsis.text: Day in and day out, the world revolves around two constant companions: a junior college student, affectionately known as Kanojo, and her beloved feline, Daru. Their bond, formed over years of shared experiences, is unbreakable. When Kanojo's roommate of a year and a half, Tomoka, moves out, the young woman faces the challenge of securing a job to maintain her living space. Through the eyes of Daru, we witness Kanojo's relentless efforts to find employment, eagerly anticipating the moment she returns home to their shared solitude. This heartwarming tale, entitled "Kanojo to Kanojo no Neko: Everything Flows," beautifully captures the unique connection between a pet and its owner, as they navigate the ups and downs of life together.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
